title: Bronze I VS Platinum V?
body: I played a normal with yas mid{{champion:157}}  vs viktor mid {{champion:112}} ( the viktor of my team was top xD ) but idk if i'm good or he is bad and was elo boosted because i won the lane and i was better than him, say what do u think about this because i feel that i can be more than bronze but maybe he was eloboosted. ty!

replies.body:
Hi I'm a plat 5 one trick pony

If I play something like ADC in a normal I will play like a bronzelord

No this does not make me boosted

> [{quoted}](name=xTheBlueBeastx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gFZrEnQ8,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-08-03T04:09:49.401+0000)
>
> Everything negative you've ever said has now been voided. You are officially irrelevant.

?? Do i know you?

> [{quoted}](name=Ghost Bride,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gFZrEnQ8,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T04:11:41.198+0000)
>
> ?? Do i know you?

Idk you, that's for sure....... stop trying to get my attention please.
You guys do realize that even pros have to learn champions before they get good at them, right? He didn't get boosted, he was trying out Viktor.

normals and ranked are seperate. Aside from that, a lot of what seperates a bronze 1 and a plat 5 player is working with a team not as much mechanics.. Now hold up.. i'm not saying a bronze 1 has as good of mechanics as a plat 5 by any means.. I'm just saying many players are capable of a higher rank if theyd cool their jets and cooperate more with others.

> [{quoted}](name=xApexPredator,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gFZrEnQ8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-03T03:48:19.356+0000)
>
> normals and ranked are seperate. Aside from that, a lot of what seperates a bronze 1 and a plat 5 player is working with a team not as much mechanics.. Now hold up.. i'm not saying a bronze 1 has as good of mechanics as a plat 5 by any means.. I'm just saying many players are capable of a higher rank if theyd cool their jets and cooperate more with others.

^
Attitude and mentality is the primary thing holding most elo players back from progressing in rank.
Some people play their mains up to their Elo. The dude was probably a first time viktor so if you've played yasuo a ton you could've been going against someone who hadn't played viktor before.

For one, your team comp destroys theirs.

Two, it was probably a bought or boosted account as Viktor was supposed to win that matchup unless your jungler helped you out a bunch.
You're probably better than Bronze with Yasuo while he probably bought his account or maybe was playing Viktor for the first time.  It's hard to say.
